alert.note: Alert for Dale; Henry; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 4:24PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Dale, southwestern Henry and northwestern Houston Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 424 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Daleville to 9 miles east of Ozark to 8 miles south of Abbeville. Movement was northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Daleville, Headland, Ozark, Dothan, Fort Rucker, Midland City, Kinsey, Newton, Pinckard, Grimes, Newville, Napier Field, Hunt Field, Waterford, Hooper Stage Field, Ewell, Cairns Aaf, Dale County Lake, Balkum and Skipperville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
